perturbation.original_text: Fulucai Productions Ltd. (the producer, publisher, content owner, authorized distributor, agent, or assignee of the Program rights, licensor, and grantor, any and all referred to herein as the “Producer”), whose principal place of business is located at 3632- 13 St. SW, Calgary, Alberta, Canada, T2T 3R1.
perturbation.changed_text: Fulucai Productions Ltd. (the content provider, publisher, content owner, authorized distributor, agent, or assignee of the Program rights, licensor, and grantor, any and all referred to herein as the “Producer”), whose principal place of business is located at 3632- 13 St. SW, Calgary, Alberta, Canada, T2T 3R1.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'producer' is replaced with 'content provider'. The contract refers to Fulucai as 'Producer'. It’s unclear whether the term ‘content provider’ and ‘Producer’ refer to the same entity, leading to confusion about contractual obligations.

perturbation.original_text: During the License Term (which is identified in the Deal Terms), Producer agrees that ConvergTV has the exclusive right to exercise the rights granted to it under this Agreement with respect to the Program, including those in Section 1, within the Licensed Territory.
perturbation.changed_text: During the License Duration (which is identified in the Deal Terms), Producer agrees that ConvergTV has the exclusive right to exercise the rights granted to it under this Agreement with respect to the Program, including those in Section 1, within the Licensed Territory.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'License Term' is replaced with 'License Duration'. Although contextually similar, they are not explicitly defined as interchangeable, potentially causing confusion. It may cause uncertainty regarding the expiration or renewal conditions of the original agreement.

perturbation.original_text: For Programs licensed by and/or through ConvergTV and that are resident in the ConvergTV distribution platform, ConvergTV shall provide reasonable protections for the ConvergTV distribution platform to prevent the unauthorized distribution, unauthorized licensing, unauthorized sub-licensing, piracy, theft of content and/or unauthorized monetization of the Programs from the ConvergTV distribution platform.
perturbation.changed_text: For Programs licensed by and/or through ConvergTV and that are resident in the ConvergTV digital media service, ConvergTV shall provide reasonable protections for the ConvergTV digital media service to prevent the unauthorized distribution, unauthorized licensing, unauthorized sub-licensing, piracy, theft of content and/or unauthorized monetization of the Programs from the ConvergTV digital media service.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'distribution platform' is replaced with 'digital media service'. This creates ambiguity about whether the protection obligations apply to all platforms or just the defined 'digital media service.'
